snippet: A museum exhibition covering nearly five decades of R. Crumb’s work opens in Paris.
abstract: Musee d’Art Moderne de la Ville de Paris opens exhibition covering nearly five decades of the work of American cartoonist Robert Crumb.
lead_paragraph: A museum exhibition covering nearly five decades of R. Crumb’s work opens in Paris.
